channel.title: omni-accounts on Stock2Shop
channel.description: Recent content in omni-accounts on Stock2Shop

item.title: Omni Accounts
item.description: Create orders on Omni Accounts This allows Stock2Shop to create an order on Omni Accounts when an order has been received from your sales channel(s). Sync Product Images When integrating with Omni Accounts, we can pull Images associated with the relevant Products into Stock2shop. These Images will be applied to the Products and will be added to the Webstore when the Product is synced through. Push Products We can update your Product data from Omni Accounts in 3 minute intervals.
